Certainly! Here are a few tips to help you find the best deals at Zara's sale:

1. Shop online during the early hours: If the sale starts online, shop during the early hours of the morning as the majority of the stock will still be available then.

2. Join the Zara loyalty program: You can get exclusive deals and early access to sales as a member of the Zara loyalty program.

3. Sign up for Zara's newsletter: Zara often sends newsletters to subscribers, which include information on upcoming sales and promotions.

4. Shop in-store: Visit the store early in the morning or during weekdays for the best selection of sizes and styles.

5. Check different sections: During a sale, items from different categories may be marked down as well, so be sure to check different sections of the store or website.

I hope these tips help you find the best deals at Zara's sale!
